loop_reachability: Can the loop with condition 'k<=N-1' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'k<=N-1' always executed?
Can the loop with condition 'i<=k-1' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'i<=k-1' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'k<=N-1' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i<=k-1' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Does the value assigned to 'argc' affect subsequent computations?
Is variable 'argv' used after its definition?
liveness: Is variable 'out' live at the end of function 'main'?
Does variable 'alpha' remain in use at the end of function 'main'?
dead_code: Can the statement 'sum[i+1][k] = sum[i][k] + r[k-i-1]*y[i][k-1];' be considered dead code?
Is this statement not dead: “for( i=0; i<=k-1; i++)”?
